CustomField.formula: IF( ISBLANK(TEXT(Frequency__c)), Weekly_Payment__c, CASE( TEXT(Frequency__c), "Daily", Weekly_Payment__c * 5, "Weekly", Weekly_Payment__c, "Bi-Weekly", Weekly_Payment__c / 2.165, "Semi-Monthly", Weekly_Payment__c / 2, "Monthly", Weekly_Payment__c / 4.33, Weekly_Payment__c ) )
CustomField.label: Estimated Current Weekly Payment
